# Hosting

The Genetic Evolution Tournament is publicly hosted on Metaculus on [this page](https://www.metaculus.com/tournament/genetic/).

There is also a [GitHub page](https://github.com/AFg6K7h4fhy2/Genetic-Evolution-Tournament) for the tournament where participants can observe the development history of the tournament and provide detailed suggestions.
